about_the_game:
Boost your roster with the Jected Expansion Pack!

Take the gold with our all new four-wheeled fiends:


  • Shark; Go all American with our iconic-styled Muscle Car
  • Montee 300SI; Turn heads, wheels and more with the all-new Compact Car
  • DeeJay SUV; Be sure to stick on four wheels with the chunky SUV
  • Mitoshi GTR; Fast? Furious? All we know, is its iconic.
  • Tenpi 500s; Sleek, stylish and, with a punk rock motif they’ll know who’s boss.
  • Buawaya Turpido - This mean machine boasts a spacious design, perfect for dominating the track and leaving your rivals in the dust

Give the podium some flare and find your style with new characters:


  • Sepp Wallner aka The Stuntman; Our resident Stuntman! What Sepp lacks in hair, he makes up in wins.
  • Saya Al-Fathi aka The Tinkerer; Who needs break down coverage when you’ve got this tinkerer on your side?
  • Samuel Baylee aka Sam the Influencer; After dominating the algorithm, Sam is ready to dominate the Race! #Cyalaternerd
  • Angelica Goldstein aka Annie the Daredevil; Like wine, she only got better with age. Be careful, this Daredevil's heart runs hotter than a naturally aspirated V8!
  • Andee aka Andree the crash test android; Built to handle crashes, Andee comes with some major perks on the track. No need to lift off that pedal, not even when you're headed straight for a wall!
  • Charlie Cheaton aka The Mascot; This mischievous Mascot will steal your 1st place while stealing the crowds heart. Make way, The Mascot is here to stay!
  • Dan Doe aka Dan the Dino-Man; Faster than a velociraptor, stronger than a T-rex. Once Dan sinks his teeth in, he never lets go.
  • Julius Slymoor Aka invincible Red Guy; Sinner or saint, once you see a red flash on the track you know it's time to repent!
detailed_description:
Boost your roster with the Jected Expansion Pack!

Take the gold with our all new four-wheeled fiends:


  • Shark; Go all American with our iconic-styled Muscle Car
  • Montee 300SI; Turn heads, wheels and more with the all-new Compact Car
  • DeeJay SUV; Be sure to stick on four wheels with the chunky SUV
  • Mitoshi GTR; Fast? Furious? All we know, is its iconic.
  • Tenpi 500s; Sleek, stylish and, with a punk rock motif they’ll know who’s boss.
  • Buawaya Turpido - This mean machine boasts a spacious design, perfect for dominating the track and leaving your rivals in the dust

Give the podium some flare and find your style with new characters:


  • Sepp Wallner aka The Stuntman; Our resident Stuntman! What Sepp lacks in hair, he makes up in wins.
  • Saya Al-Fathi aka The Tinkerer; Who needs break down coverage when you’ve got this tinkerer on your side?
  • Samuel Baylee aka Sam the Influencer; After dominating the algorithm, Sam is ready to dominate the Race! #Cyalaternerd
  • Angelica Goldstein aka Annie the Daredevil; Like wine, she only got better with age. Be careful, this Daredevil's heart runs hotter than a naturally aspirated V8!
  • Andee aka Andree the crash test android; Built to handle crashes, Andee comes with some major perks on the track. No need to lift off that pedal, not even when you're headed straight for a wall!
  • Charlie Cheaton aka The Mascot; This mischievous Mascot will steal your 1st place while stealing the crowds heart. Make way, The Mascot is here to stay!
  • Dan Doe aka Dan the Dino-Man; Faster than a velociraptor, stronger than a T-rex. Once Dan sinks his teeth in, he never lets go.
  • Julius Slymoor Aka invincible Red Guy; Sinner or saint, once you see a red flash on the track you know it's time to repent!
